body:
There seems to be a lot these days.
Seems like SpongeBob had a lot of controversy.
In One Coarse Meal and Are You Happy Now?, it seems like they joke about suicide a bit.
In SpongeBob, You're Fired! they joke about unemployment making it look like it is good to be unemployed as an adult.

Discuss!

title: Controversy In Kids Shows
